title: GLOBAL FIRST: All-New Ford Mustang GT Supercars Race Car Revealed at Bathurst 1000
description: BATHURST, Australia, Oct. 6, 2022 – Ford has today revealed the first race-prepared seventh-generation Mustang, with the 2023 Mustang GT ‘Gen3’ Supercar uncovered at Mount Panorama ahead of the famous Bathurst 1000.
